name: BROKE PROTOCOL: Online City RPG
description: Become the Most Successful (or Most Wanted) man in the city. Broke Protocol is a low-poly open-world action game with a strong focus on roleplaying features. You define your own goals and identity in a persistent, interactive, and reactive online sandbox. Currently in Early Access.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 32/64-bit Процессор: 1.8 GHz Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Support Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Версии 9.0c Место на диске: 300 MB
